name: Tomato Sauce With Onion and Butter
recipeIngredient:
2 pounds fresh ripe tomatoes, blanched as described below*, or 2 cups 
canned imported Italian tomatoes, cut up, with their juice
1 medium onion, peeled and cut in half

recipeInstructions.text:
Put either the prepared fresh tomatoes or the canned ones in a medium saucepan, add the butter, onion and salt and cook uncovered at a very slow 
but steady simmer for about 45 minutes, or until it is thickened to your liking 
and the fat floats free from the tomato.

Stir from time to time, mashing up large pieces of tomato with the back of a 
wooden spoon. Taste and correct for salt. Discard the onion before tossing with pasta.
